function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Natural ventilation may be compromised in cold weather, leading to reduced outdoor airflow.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation.","Mitigation":"Implementation of hybrid ventilation strategies to ensure adequate ventilation in all weather conditions.","Technologies":"Hybrid ventilation systems that can adjust to different weather conditions.","People":"Building occupants, especially in cold climates.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and ventilation system engineers."},{"Description":"Mechanically ventilated rooms may have significantly varying ventilation rates depending on their location and layout.","Impact":"Uneven ventilation rates can lead to areas with inadequate ventilation, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementation of uniform ventilation system designs and regular testing and maintenance of ventilation rates.","Technologies":"Centralized ventilation systems with monitoring and control capabilities.","People":"Building owners, facility managers, and ventilation system engineers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and ventilation system engineers."},{"Description":"Displacement ventilation promotes vertical stratification and higher ventilation effectiveness but may have mixed cost-effectiveness.","Impact":"Inconsistent cost-effectiveness of displacement ventilation may hinder its widespread adoption, affecting overall ventilation effectiveness.","Mitigation":"Further investigation of displacement ventilation's efficacy in integrated outcomes and potential cost-saving measures.","Technologies":"Displacement ventilation systems with cost-effective design and installation options.","People":"Building owners, ventilation system engineers, and researchers.","Owner":"Building owners, ventilation system engineers, and researchers."}]}
